http://www.twitch.tv/gregroxmun

Tune in for an exciting adventure in space and time as we explore the Shimularity! That's a portmanteau of Shimmy and Singularity!

It will be full of Hilarity!

I assure you, streams of this quality are quite in a bit of a rarity.
This looks like something for our "Live from Mission Control!" section. Carry on
